title: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard, a message stating 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' is displayed at the top, even when the package name field is empty.
EB: The New Java Package wizard should not display the message 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' when the package name field is empty.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Invoke the New Java Package wizard.
